result.name: police-use-of-firearms
result.notes:
Statistics on police use of firearms in the 43 Home Office funded police forces in England and Wales.

It covers information on the number of police firearms operations, operations involving armed response vehicles, the number of incidents in which police firearms were discharged and the number of authorised firearms officers.

organization.name: home-office
organization.title: Home Office
organization.description:
The Home Office leads on immigration and passports, drugs policy, crime policy and counter-terrorism and works to ensure visible, responsive and accountable policing in the UK.

Home Office is a ministerial department, supported by 26 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/home-office

result.title: Police use of firearms
